lead_paragraph: HANDLER--Mark S. The Atlantic Golf Club mourns the passing of member and friend, Mark S. Handler. We extend our sincere condolences and heartfelt sympathy to his wife, Barbara, his children, Jody and Jonathan and their families. Dennis A. Suskind, President Harvey L. Radler, Vice President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HANDLER, MARK S
